website_summaries.verdict: The Philips BT3500 may not excel in any one area, but its slim design is appealing and it delivers decent performance for an affordable price.
pros: The Philips BT3500 is a slim, relatively compact Bluetooth speaker that offers decent sound for an affordable price
It also has built-in speakerphone capabilities and NFC tap-to-pair for devices that support that feature
cons: Battery life could be a bit better
not the most durable speaker and no protective case is included

customer_reviews.title: average sound box/speaker, indoor
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as I had the smaller SB-30 already for years, totally happy with it, but now getting a bit weak. The BT3500 is supposed to have stereo, 10W (other was mono, 4W), sound in comparison is not much different, though. Deep basses are not what I expected. It's totally fine for indoor-use with neighbors, not really recommendable for outdoor, like huge terraces or even at the beach (with noises around). Positive aspect: it can be in use while charging the device at the same time. Price is lower-end.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Caution! Cuts volume in half on its own.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Phillips model that worked perfect. Excited about the brand and quality I decided to go with this one. Very loud and pretty good bass for the size. It worked great for a while. One day took it outside because I decided to bbq and it was perfect at full volume until it decided to lower itself to half the volume. Tried multiple devices on Bluetooth and it was doing the same thing. Worked fine again for a few days after and again one day decided to lower the volume itself. Sadly I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer 101

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Small Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased this same speaker from another merchant about 4-5 yrs ago but dropped it a couple of times and ruined it. I liked it so much because I use it as my "bathroom speaker" when I take a shower. I love to listen to music when I shower and the size and sound is perfect. Can't find a speaker this size with such a great base sound. All the other speakers this size and price range sound a bit too tinny for me. So I am so glad I found it again on Amazon and at a cheaper price than when I initially bought it a few years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Marg

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I purchased the 3500 because refurbed it was $19 so I said "what the heck" and boy am I glad that I did. It pairs easily with all my devices especially my Echo dot which I really purchased it for. The sound is huge for such a small speaker. I'm very happy. BTW, my unit didn't come with a manual so I went to the Phillips site, put the model in the search, & a PDF manual pulls right up. Downloaded it to my computer & I'm ready to go should I need to consult it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: anotherVulcan

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of the speaker. Battery life seems pretty decent too. However, after only a month of usage at roughly mid-volume range, the sound is getting highly distorted, even the voices of the singers. I can't use it anymore and just missed the month return window so I'm out the money for basically disposable item. If I were you, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice little speaker except for very poor battery performance. Won’t charge above 70%, immediately dips down to 40% and can’t get more than 4 hours total use out of it. Sticker shows manufacture date of Dec / 2016, I guess sitting around for almost four years with no charge will do that. Disappointed in what I had always thought of as a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. White

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat the quality and sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Had the smaller BT2500 for several years and used it on a daily basis in the bathroom and took on trips also. The BT3500 has much more volume and the sound quality is better. It is only being used for music, so not sure how well it works for phone Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: web zurfer

customer_reviews.title: Jam out with this device!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does what it says and meets the expectations I had in mind before receiving this speaker. When the device is fully charged it does display a very high-quality and bassful sound. I (someone that listens to music every day) recommends this devise because it compares to my expensive products similar to this but does the same thing. I work in a hotel lobby and I use the speaker for the whole lobby and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Second time customer
customer_reviews.text: We have always been impressed with this speaker, having bought our first one years ago for way more money than is being charged by this vendor. I suppose the only complaint I have about the design is that the micro USB outlet is what ultimately wore out, on our original speaker. It had alot of hard use, but it is a shame to have had to toss it on account of a dodgy connection.
customer_reviews.author: DBR

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Philips speaker for over a year and it is still going strong. I have not had any problems everything still works and sounds great. I use this in the car for my drive to and from work with my kindle fire playing tunes with the VLC player and it sounds great. To keep the volume high I charge the speaker once a week for four to six hours. Overall this was a great buy......I would buy this speaker again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dudonis

customer_reviews.title: If you climb for work/hobby then buy this!
customer_reviews.text: If you work in the tower climbing, electric poles or tree climbing. This is high recommended. If you do climbing as a hobby...this is recommended. I use this for work, especially when climbing the space above the volume is good for some rope tied to a carabiner. The Mic comes in handy if someone calls from the ground I don't have to leave my phone out. Just answer and insert it back into my bag/pocket and use the mic on the speaker. This thing is loud, so when you are in the air keep in mind those below you can hear everything. So watch the Tupac, Limp Bizkit or w/e when you are working next to the elementary school.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous3

customer_reviews.title: The little speaker that could
customer_reviews.text: This little box can push out some serious sound at high volume. Easy to pair and even easier to use, this speaker can produce sounds even in a mechanic shop with tools going (I'm an auto mechanic). The only thing I dont like about the speaker, is that it feels really light and fragile. I have yet to damage it, so its proving me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: I am often a "hard sell," but this little speaker is way over the top in quality, in my book!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine a speaker working any better than this! I have enjoyed it so much! I move it from room to room with me, and can hear the music all over our (one-story) home. The sound it produces is much better than when listening from my computer, and especially greatly improves the sound that comes from my Kindle Fire 8 HD. The sound level can be made WAY louder than necessary - but about half of that is very adequate!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but not last very long!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and the sound is very good! Good buy! I see the review about the recharge battery? I am kind of scared that when and how long It will stop working! Update 2019 June I haven’t using it for half year now, because I cant recharge it. The inside piece connects to the usb cord is broken I guess, because I tried several plugs which all works fine. I wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: This has got to be the best value for price little speaker anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little speaker several years ago. Over the years I have probably repurchased 10 or 12 of these for small gifts. People just look at the little thing and say Thank You. But every time I get a call back about how incredible the little Phillips speaker is in quality of sound. Its a real value. Thanks Phillips.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer 90% of the time

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We originally had the smaller one which we loved, but that one finally took a crap and we decided to upgrade. It was such a good decision! The sound is even better and the bass is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive with Expensive Sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I have one for my clients at work, one for my office, one in our bathroom and bought one for my dad’s classroom. Extremely easy to use and has incredible sound quality for the price. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Sydney Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Just bought another one
customer_reviews.text: Works with iPhone, Android, laptops, etc. It sounds better when you set it on a car fender or coffee table that resonates. 1st one died after 3 years. Just bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Fastner

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome BT speaker, impressive sound from such a slim enclosure. Great to take to driving range and jam while hitting some balls...! Battery lasts a long time. The highs could be a bit crisper, that's about it, otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: awGuru

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Don't expect a big stereo sound but it is as good as some I have seen for up to $200. Before buying this I went to a store that had many set up and I listened to most of them, even those out of my price range. I just wanted something I could listen to in the park or use when I gave a small presentation with a small group of people. I was so impressed with this that I bought it from my mobil app while I was still in the store. I was not disappointed when I got it home and played it. Nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aquila

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound , full & rich . The manual volume control is a lot easier to use than the buttons on my phone . I would recommend this device .
customer_reviews.author: PAA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can play my music on this through my phone or I-pad. The quality is pretty good and I can get a nice volume out of it. If I am worried about batter life I can plug it in and not have to worry. It is easy to connect and I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with either charge cord or speaker box.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the first one back in April. Soon after I realized that either the charger cord or the speaker itself was not holding the charge. I was able to make an exchange in May because it was within the 30 days of purchase. It is now October and the replacement speaker box is doing the same thing except this time it's outside of the 30 day purchase warranty and can't get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo mandujano

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice speaker with great sound. However, the on/of button and bluetooth button is tiny. It has to slide to the middle to be on bluetooth. It is hard to tell when the bluetooth is in the on position. And, you forget to turn off the power so the battery runs out frequently. It would have been simpler to have a nice on off switch that was clear.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for wireless travel speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound via Bluetooth from my phone for the price. Sound is comparable to smaller and way more expensive Beats speaker and better than a few others that are similar price. Use an equalizer app for best sound. Bass and treble have good range. Volume range is also very wide. Battery lasted full 7 hours in the car on a road trip without recharging. I kept it plugged in the whole time I was in a hotel, so I'm not sure how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: NVCaveMan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is the battery life, it lasts about 4-5 hrs on a full battery. Considering that other speakers last 9-10 hrs that's pretty weak. But for $12 I shouldn't complain, overall I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rmz

customer_reviews.title: It is an old model
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea, specially that I used Phillips headphones before, but the sound quality is disappointing, specially with phone calls, phone speaker is much louder. I think that one is an old model, may be Phillips has a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Adel M.

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, great range, and decent bass!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - 10/5/19 - Four and half years later this speaker is still working great! Of all the Bluetooth speakers I’ve had experience with since we first bought this, this one still sounds better and the battery is life still long lasting. As other's mentioned this little speaker is pretty impressive. It has great battery life and there is some bass too that doesn't get distorted. Mind you it's not going to be thumping bass but it's a much better speaker than others at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: ErikGoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid portable speaker, which is what I would expect from Phillips. Unlike a different Phillips speaker I bought (which was underpowered junk), this was adequate for my needs. It needs to be a little bit louder for 5 stars. UPDATE: June, 2015 Speaker stopped working a couple of weeks ago, and is now a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Very average quality, design, quality of sound.
customer_reviews.text: Tried it, but it is really nothing unusual or high quality. If you need source of silent music in background on your desk, probably that's it. No more excitation. Volume knob seems to be shoddy and move in each direction. Try to look on the picture how the rear side look like...
customer_reviews.author: Wojtekborys

customer_reviews.title: Best inexpensive Bluetooth speaker available
customer_reviews.text: I have three different Bluetooth speakers, in my opinion this one is the best inexpensive product you can buy. The controls and charging extremely simple. Bought it to listen to audiobooks not for music stereo.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small package.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am extremely surprised at the sound produced by the BT Speaker. I definitely feel that my money was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES L.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the size. Have really enjoyed this speaker. So much that I ordered 12 for gifts at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money at least if you have a phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, fairly simple... but the audio speaker on my Samsung S8 is actually louder than this external speaker, and the audio quality is about the same. Waste of money at least if you have a phone with good audio output like an S8.
customer_reviews.author: K. Conover

customer_reviews.title: I hear you loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: Loud! I play racquetball and use this to jam out while practicing. I can hear the music over the cracks of thunder that are my shots... easily! Used to use headphone and tried another BT speaker. This trumps 'em all. This will play loud enough that if someone wants to talk to me on the court, I have to turn it down to hear them. Easy pairing, dial volume knob is nicer than the standard up/son buttons. ("I miss dials" he said nostalgically.)
customer_reviews.author: AllfortheBacon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is very good. Great sounds. good controls (imagine...a volume control with a knob, just like the old days). Not waterproof, but who really needs to dance in the shower?
customer_reviews.author: Alvin R. Werchan

customer_reviews.title: Worth we’ll Beyond $12
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a fantastic value, and of good quality —especially given the $12 price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommended! It’s really perfect in every way like look, sound, quality... also, great customer service... Go for it !
customer_reviews.author: Hedi 555

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast
customer_reviews.text: I love how loud it gets, the quality of sound is great. I use it at home and at work and it makes things nice. I love having a dial volume on it as well, as buttons tend to wear out pretty quick. I got the Nfc version and I do not regret it. I have always bought Phillips speakers and I always will because they have never let me down. I had one before for 5 years before I had to retire it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grant III

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, sounds good loud enough for what we want ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine , sounds good loud enough for what we want to do with it. The only thing that is kind of a bummer it doesn't seem to hold a charge that wel and you can't tell how much battery is left. You just need to make sure you charge it up if you are planning on using it for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker every day. I am very happy with every aspect of this product, especially the price. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: ... because my coworker had one and we seemed to like everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because my coworker had one and we seemed to like everything about it. It is good size, not bulky so sits nice on my desk. The sound is nice, the connection is good and overall just a nice product. I would recommend to anyone looking for a wireless speaker with Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: S. Earle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and powerful volume
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Great sound and powerful volume. I particularly like the analog volume knob, easy to adjust and gives it a retro feel
customer_reviews.author: andreea

customer_reviews.title: Nice crisp trebles.LACK OF BASS RUINS IT.
customer_reviews.text: Really crisp clear highs is what I love about this speaker.But NO BASS. NONE.
customer_reviews.author: MARCO'

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these and both have broken. The place where you plug the adapter in to charge it breaks real easily. Don't bother buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: great sound, nice size and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we have purchased, great sound, nice size and worth the money. My daughter packs this thing everywhere. She is not gentle on things and this took the beating! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just soapin

customer_reviews.title: Works great in hotels to broadcast sound from a movie on ...
customer_reviews.text: Louder than you think it might be. Works great in hotels to broadcast sound from a movie on your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Crusher75060

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. This is my second purchase of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice small speaker
customer_reviews.text: For the size, it sounds ok. I use it in garage while working on my bikes, does the job. It is not a ghetto blaster, but sounds much better that just your phone's loudspeaker with music.
customer_reviews.author: BlackLodge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BT Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Wholly surprised by this little device! I paint apartments a lot as a maintenance man at an apartment complex, and it fills the place with music streaming from my cell phone via BT. The battery lasts forever and the sound quality blows away my Galaxy Note 3's speaker. Glad I picked it up on a Gold Box deal.
customer_reviews.author: Blueeyedgoat

customer_reviews.title: Good portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Decent small and portable speaker. Wish it was slightly louder but it depends on your listening environment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Good bass response. Slim design. Worth paying more for over the smaller model.
customer_reviews.author: johne262

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sound for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This has the most amazing sound for such a small speaker. I think with the lower price that'll i'll buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: First day using it, worked well. Easy to Bluetooth pair, then simple operation from iPhone SE. I like the flat profile and size. Sound is good and no one could detect source of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wood

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is great. I connect to my phone or tablet for ...
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great. I connect to my phone or tablet for music when I have a day project in the backyard or wherever and it lasts as long as my project. Good sound, relatively small, easy to connect, and the audible "connected" sound when it's successfully connected and ready to play is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Draper817

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Batter life not super long but its good also
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Volume low
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a Bluetooth speaker for my phone in the car. Volume was very low.
customer_reviews.author: nicki662

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to pair with her phone and worked wonderfully with ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 16 year old to keep her from blasting her music throughout the house on the sound system. It was easy to pair with her phone and worked wonderfully with a nice clear sound. Then she blew it. Not the poor little speakers fault, but it took her a good two months to do so, which speaks to the quality of the device. Great item for anyone who will use it reasonably!
customer_reviews.author: Natiera

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Control
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and it was very important to me to have a volume knob. The knob allows me to control the volume at precise levels, previous Bluetooth speaks were just buttons that jumped in volume too much either too loud or too quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sennett

customer_reviews.title: Great for Music Lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these speakers. It is wonderful for a party or a classroom or even when you are cleaning to music around the house.
customer_reviews.author: jbatti

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker for my desk at work
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for my desk at work. This is not going to replace a nice sound system but is a good sound for the price. I bought a 1/8 inch stereo plug so I could play my ipod on it but I can also use the WiFi on my smartphone to play anything off my phone. It has a rechargeable battery which charges via an included USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bullis

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve owned. I blew my first one pushing the volume too much. But it’s a great little speaker. Good volume. Good sound. Holds charge well. Can’t beat for price
customer_reviews.author: D. Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is good for volume not for beats. Very light very portable. I use it in the office to augment my laptop's speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting battery and is loud without distortion. This is my second one, the first was stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these and both stopped working after a month or so. Good sound quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Tonella

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for the work place.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound easy to adjust and works great at work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great, but synching via Blue Tooth on my Mac ...
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great, but synching via Blue Tooth on my Mac is unreliable. Sometimes it does; other times I have to reset the Blue tooth on the Mac. It may start playing on the product and then stop. Don't know if it is a product problem or a Mac problem but I can't count on it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my garage and great for me. Very durable.....I have dropped it on the concrete floor 5 or 6 times and it doesn't faze it.
customer_reviews.author: John Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and go for a speaker in the 50-100 dollar range. The charge port is flimsy. This speaker sounded great for the first month, then it sounded like a tin can. It makes a great paper weight though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for such a tiny speaker, easy wireless hookup
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly full sound for such a tiny speaker. Even with my tech-chalenged self I was able to easily link it with my ipod for wireless sound. Good value, easy on/off. Need to let it charge for about 2 hours at first but easy to maintain, easy to move
customer_reviews.author: urbangal

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge after only 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this device a month and it had great sound quality but the charger is no longer making a connection. Great price but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kiely Yocum

customer_reviews.title: Correct functioning??!
customer_reviews.text: For my iPhone... but sometimes it skips no sound ... I guess it’s the either pairing (???) And other two options WiFi I guess and Audio in. I must be doing something wrong, but it serves it’s purpose. MR
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is amazing for so small a speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying my new compact wireless Phillips speaker. The sound is amazing for so small a speaker. I also have two Bose speakers that I use, which are both wonderful. But the Phillips is so much more compact and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker for the price & size. It gets plenty loud & is very intuitive to pair and use. The only thing I wish it had are marks for louder/softer, but that's a pretty minor complaint overall.
customer_reviews.author: richdiet

customer_reviews.title: Adaptability
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use plus great sound the only problem is it doesn't stay charged for very long
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great option given the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my dad as a fathers day present, and he immediately put it to use. Well made, better than decent sound, and very portable. Best budget friendly option I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Brodginski

customer_reviews.title: good quality sounds
customer_reviews.text: Fast charge, good quality sounds, easy to connect on Bluetooth, easy to carry at any where and affordable price
customer_reviews.author: nacho

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, nicely compact, but it could really use a 'pause' button
customer_reviews.text: ...of the sort that most other small Bluetooth speakers have. One tends to walk around with the speaker and leave the phone or tablet charging, but when interrupted it should be easy to pause the player (and I've found that most players look for the event broadcast after the pause-over-Bluetooth).
customer_reviews.author: Doktor_Polidori

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sound /speaker quality is poor compared to other products in a similar price range.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferLouise

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a month. I wasted my money. Volume got really low.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Very good, portable bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very good, portable bluetooth speaker. Not as much volume as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Altman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a very good personal speaker.great for around the house or in the bathroom or in your bedroom.it is small and compact but has amazing sound.definetly not for parties but goodness for personal use
customer_reviews.author: Mya D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Buzzed, like other reviews state. Returned and bought a Flip.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinegirrl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The BT2500 was exactly what I thought it would be. An overall well-priced full-ranged Bluetooth speaker. Phillips had three Bluetooth speakers displayed side-by-side at Walmart; all which could be activated for a sound demonstration. The BT2500 was sized right for my needs although the other two speakers both sounded very good for larger applications.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is bomb. Tip: use command strips ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is bomb. Tip: use command strips on the back to stick it on the wall in whatever room you are in.
customer_reviews.author: Re

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Like it......... I love it , this products sounds GREAT well worth the asking price. I am Very happy with my purchase in fact I would buy the company, if I could afford it.
customer_reviews.author: T T

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and withstands drops
customer_reviews.text: Product still working great! I can be clumsy and have dropped this speaker a few times. Solidly built and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Esme000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like the volume button and doesn't distort even when wide open. Sounds great in my home where it's quiet. Holds its own in a loud kitchen. Overall great product. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: joseph cloaninger

customer_reviews.title: This product is out of this world wonderful. I have a tablet and the audio is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is out of this world wonderful. I have a tablet and the audio is low. This made a huge difference. A GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!!!! No one paid me to say so. if it was bad I would say so that is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much bought another here in the states
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these in France and left it over there for our holidays. Loved it so much bought another here in the states. Great sound and portability. separate wheel volume control handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Zacharie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound and volume for such a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound and volume for such a little speaker. Easy bluetooth connection and decent battey life. I would put the sound quality at about the level of a fair sized table radio. Good enough to make for enjoyable listening in a small and convenient package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dad. He loves it. The speaker sounds loud enough for him to talk when on phone, and sound great when he listens to the music. He carries it with him all the time. And good thing is it does not drop connection.
customer_reviews.author: DLe

customer_reviews.title: Just so you know.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounded great but lasted about one year with minimal play. The battery died I had to break the unit to try to replace the battery. Great product if you don't expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: great sound quality for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Love it .. bought this for my husband as an anniversary gift and he loves it he uses it for work , and he loves the distance range he can leave the speaker at a safe good distance and still be able to change the song with his phone and hear it clearly .
customer_reviews.author: Lali

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little speaker.  Logo rattles.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. But the PHILIPS logo is a little loose and rattles at loud volumes. I couldn't figure out what the noise was at first. A pice of scotch tape over the logo solved the problem. I guess you could also break it off with a screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sutton

customer_reviews.title: I have it plugged into my kitchen island and it sounds great while I'm cooking
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by the sound coming out of such a small speaker. I have it plugged into my kitchen island and it sounds great while I'm cooking, and I can clearly take calls as well. A nice little unit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Champion

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I bought two for both of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought two for both of my girls and I use it as often as they do. The sound is great and seems to hold a charge for quite a while. These were Christmas gifts and it is now May and they are still working like day one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Viars

customer_reviews.title: Portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Product worked and is working better than i expected,great value for the money. Wouldn't mind buying another
customer_reviews.author: Ash 1

customer_reviews.title: and especially like the built in volume control
customer_reviews.text: This works well...and especially like the built in volume control...Look around for deals...got one for $24.00 rather than the $39 price I see as new on other sites
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Looking for great clear sound for a low price this is it ❤
customer_reviews.text: This is great ! It gets really loud but a dislike is that the battery doesn't last long as long as i would like it too so i just leave it plugged in to my fast-charger whenever i use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

Anti-clipping function for loud, distortion free music
Built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls
